= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *HTA.HT.MPN* || Medial Preoptic Nucleus || Controlling of sexual behaviors || ||
|| *HTA.HT.SO* || Supraoptic Nucleus || Blood volume or blood pressure || ||
|| *HTA.HT.PV* || Paraventricular Nucleus || Regulate appetite and autonomic functions || ||
|| *HTA.HT.AH* || Anterior Hypothalamic Nucleus || Thermoregulation, panting, sweating || ||
|| *HTA.HT.SN* || Suprachiasmatic Nucleus || 24-hour rhythms || ||
|| *HTA.HT.LPN* || Lateral Preoptic Nucleus || Thermoregulation || ||
|| *HTA.HT.LT* || Lateral Nucleus || Thirst and hunger || ||
|| *HTA.HT.DM* || Dorsomedial Hypothalamic Nucleus || Blood pressure, heart rate || ||
|| *HTA.HT.VM* || Ventromedial Nucleus || Satiety || ||
|| *HTA.HT.AR* || Arcuate Nucleus || Regulation of growth, appetite and body weight || ||
|| *HTA.HT.PN* || Posterior Nucleus || Blood pressure, pupillary dilation || ||
|| *HTA.MB* || Mammillary body || Control feeding reflexes || ||
|| *HTA.NMB* || Basal Nucleus of Meynert || Control imagination vs perception || ACh source, attention ||
